title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 July 2008 - XWiki
content:
continuum - (15/07/2008 13:32): BUILD ERROR: XWiki Products - Enterprise - Web http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33197&projectId=73  
asyd - (15/07/2008 13:33): ola  
continuum - (15/07/2008 13:39): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - LDAP Functional Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33199&projectId=259  
asyd - (15/07/2008 14:18): ping?  
asyd - (15/07/2008 14:19): I'm stil looking for a way to define the contents of a comboxbox forms by using somethething else than a velocity query :/  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 14:27): hi @ all can someone tell me what xwar file i have to import in a virtual wiki? do i have to import the xem1.2 xar or the xwiki-enterprise1.4.1.xar?  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:25): maggo\_: xwiki-enterprise1.4.1.xar  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:25): xem xar is only for the main wiki  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 15:25): thx  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:25): asyd: still here ?  
asyd - (15/07/2008 15:32): yup  
continuum - (15/07/2008 15:43): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - Functional Selenium Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33268&projectId=373  
asyd - (15/07/2008 15:46): jvdrean: ? ;p  
continuum - (15/07/2008 15:46): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise Manager - Functional Selenium Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33270&projectId=254  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 15:47): jvdrean: after the update everything seems to be ok but my history funktion does not correctly work if i click on a earlier version i get a failure   
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 15:47): http://pastebin.centos.org/9499  
continuum - (15/07/2008 15:49): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise Manager - Functional XMLRPC Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33271&projectId=253  
continuum - (15/07/2008 15:50): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise Manager - Functional XMLRPC Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33272&projectId=250  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:53): asyd: back, shoot  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:53): maggo\_: which version of xwiki are you using ?  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:54): maggo\_: have you migrated your wiki recently ?  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 15:55): XEM 1.2.10229 with xwiki-enterprise-manager-wiki-administrator-1.2.xar  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 15:55): the virtual wiki have xwiki-enterprise-wiki-1.4.1.xar  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 15:57): is it a fresh install ?  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 15:59): jvdrean: yes fresh install, but with database content from 1.2  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:00): ok so it's a migration from 1.2 :)  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:01): jvdrean: yes you're right  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:01): hum, the versioning mechanism has been modified in 1.3  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:01): jvdrean: strange is that i can rollback but the preview i cant't see  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:01): can you paste you xwiki.cfg somewhere ?  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:02): jvdrean : sure one moment  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:03): jvdrean: http://pastebin.centos.org/9500  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:03): ok so you've #  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:03): xwiki.store.migration=all  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:05): you've this problem on any page ?  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:10): jvdrean: i tasted 20 pages now and it looks like that it apears on any page  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:13): http://xwiki.markmail.org/message/zjxb2lmxagirpynq?q=Exception+while+patching  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:14): looks like you're not the only one  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:19): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2035  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:28): jvdrean: ok the second is long i read it at the moment but till now i don't understand what i can do?!?  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:30): I think we can summarize the second by "the migration has not been done on the subwikis, only on main"  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:30): do you have a problem on the main wiki ?  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:48): jvdrean: the main wiki is only used for manage the farm, so there was nothhing written down, and so there is no history  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:48): jvdrean: i made now some changes and on the main wiki it looks fine  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 16:49): maggo\_: and with a newly created page on a subwiki ?  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:53): jvdrean: looks fine too  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 16:54): after 6 edits i can see all history pages  
maggo\_ - (15/07/2008 17:04): jvdrean: can i upgrade the database again  
continuum - (15/07/2008 17:51): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - Functional Selenium Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33319&projectId=258

xwikibot - (15/07/2008 18:42): Main.InstallationInstructions was modified by xwiki:XWiki.LudovicDubost - http://curriki.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/InstallationInstructions  
xwikibot - (15/07/2008 18:46): Main.InstallationInstructions was modified by xwiki:XWiki.LudovicDubost - http://curriki.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/InstallationInstructions  
maggo\_\_ - (15/07/2008 18:59): jvdrean: online?  
continuum - (15/07/2008 18:59): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Platform - Core - Context http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33353&projectId=296  
maggo\_\_ - (15/07/2008 19:19): is someone online how can help me, my database shema of the virtual wikis i have seems to be not updated, now my history throws exceptions instead showing me the old site (http://pastebin.centos.org/9499)  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 19:20): maggo\_\_: back but I have to go  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 19:20): you should send an email to the users list  
maggo\_\_ - (15/07/2008 19:20): jvdrean: oh bad  
jvdrean - (15/07/2008 19:20): with as much details as you can  
maggo\_\_ - (15/07/2008 19:20): jvdrean: ok  thank you   
continuum - (15/07/2008 19:23): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise Manager - Distribution - HSQLDB http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33369&projectId=93
